title: The Forgotten
description: The next heart-pounding instalment in Mason Sabre's Paranormal Romance, Society Series, Stephen Davies returns, and this time, he's ready.Step one - escapeStep two - save the childrenStep three - save everyone elseHumans call it science - The Others call it cruelty, fear, and excuses. Two years they've spent in captivity. Two years of Humans performing experiments on them and creating the unborn children Helena carries. But no more.Tiger shifter, Stephen Davies, has more to fight for than simply his own survival this time. When the Humans try to transport him and his pregnant wife to another facility, he knows it's become a make or break situation. Execution is coming. While this book is part of a series, it can be read as a standalone.Â It is a complete story and may contain spoilers for previous books in the series.
author: Mason Sabre
